Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.HAT:
When using the effect that shuffles cards into the Deck:
● To activate this effect, you must have at least 3 monsters in your GY before detaching.
● To activate this effect, you must have at least 1 card in your Deck.
● After detaching, you can target the detached monster.
● If any target leaves the GY before this effect resolves, nothing is shuffled, and no card is drawn.

When using the effect that Special Summons:
● To activate this effect, you must have at least 1 non-effect monster in your GY before detaching.
● After detaching, you can target the detached monster, if it is a non-effect monster in the GY.

PSCT.HAT:
2 Level 4 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Target 3 monsters in your GY; shuffle all 3 into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
● Target 1 non-Effect Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

● Target 1 non-Effect Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.
